Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to posting information and reporting on dress code policies in New York city public schools, and to repeal section two of such local law upon the expiration thereof
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Posting information and reporting on dress code policies in NYC public schools, and to repeal section two of such local law upon the expiration thereof.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York City Department of Education to create an inclusive school dress code policy that complies with Title IX of the Federal Education Amendments Act and accounts for diverse cultures, gender expressions and body diversity.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Department of Education to create an inclusive school dress code policy that complies with Title IX of the Federal Education Amendments Act and accounts for diverse cultures, gender expressions and body diversity.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to posting information and reporting on dress code policies in New York city public schools, and to repeal section two of such local law upon the expiration thereof
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: Posting information and reporting on dress code policies in NYC public schools, and to repeal section two of such local law upon the expiration thereof.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to posting information and reporting on dress code policies in New York city public schools, and to repeal section two of such local law upon the expiration thereof
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amended by Committee
Items.MatterName: Posting information and reporting on dress code policies in NYC public schools, and to repeal section two of such local law upon the expiration thereof.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York City Department of Education to create an inclusive school dress code policy that complies with Title IX of the Federal Education Amendments Act and accounts for diverse cultures, gender expressions and body diversity.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Department of Education to create an inclusive school dress code policy that complies with Title IX of the Federal Education Amendments Act and accounts for diverse cultures, gender expressions and body diversity.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to posting information and reporting on dress code policies in New York city public schools, and to repeal section two of such local law upon the expiration thereof
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
